items.title: Guidance: DBT goods regulation mailbox privacy notice
items.summary: How the Department for Business and Trade (DBT) as a ‘data controller’ processes personal data for the purposes of responding to your email query specifically sent to the Goods Regulation mailbox.

items.title: Billions in exports and investment deals secured as PM concludes visit to China
items.summary: Billions of pounds worth of export and investment deals for the UK have been secured, as the Prime Minister wraps up his visit to China.

items.title: Promotional material: Prime Minister visit to China: trade and investment factsheet
items.summary: Summary of the trade and investment outcomes of the Prime Minister's visit to China in January 2026.

items.title: Research: Export Wins to China: 2025, Quarter 1 to Quarter 3 confirmed results
items.summary: UK export deals, contracts, sales, or agreements with China resulting from export promotion support by the Department for Business and Trade (DBT) confirmed in 2025 financial year, quarter 1 to quarter 3.

items.title: Trade with Norway
items.summary: How you import from and export to Norway.

items.title: Trade with Liechtenstein
items.summary: How you import from and export to Liechtenstein

items.title: Guidance: Export advice for SMEs doing business in the UK and overseas
items.summary: This toolkit contains, advice, top tips and support for SMEs looking to grow their business in the UK and export to exciting markets such as the USA.

items.title: Start exporting to Africa
items.summary: Find out about market opportunities, trade partnership agreements, support from the UK government, and export regulations and taxes in African countries.

items.title: Guidance: Navigating NATO procurement
items.summary: This guide aims to help UK companies interested in accessing NATO-funded business opportunities.

items.title: Aid funded business
items.summary: Guidance for UK companies on winning business from international aid and development projects.

items.title: Horizon Europe funding
items.summary: Funding for research or innovation that's ground breaking, improves European research standards or responds to challenges like climate change or food security.

items.title: Corporate report: DESNZ: framework documents
items.summary: Information about how the Department for Energy Security and Net Zero (DESNZ) works with its public bodies.

items.title: Research: Research into governance models for Smart Data
items.summary: Research into the design of a cross-economy Smart Data governance model.

items.title: Assurance of sustainability reporting
items.summary: This consultation seeks views on the government's proposal for greater regulatory oversight of third-party assurance services for sustainability-related financial disclosures.

items.title: Capacity Market: proposal regarding locational changes of Capacity Market Units
items.summary: We are seeking views on a proposed change to remove the ability for the location of a CMU to be changed after Prequalification. This change is proposed to come into force in Winter 2025 for all existing and new agreements.

items.title: Statutory guidance: Capacity Market Rules
items.summary: The Capacity Market Rules provide the detail for implementing the operating framework set out in regulations.

items.title: Continuing the Warm Home Discount Scheme
items.summary: We're seeking views on the design of the Warm Home Discount scheme from winter 2026 to 2027 to 2030 to 2031.

items.title: Energy bill support extended for millions of families
items.summary: Warm Home Discount has been extended so millions of families will receive the £150 energy bill discount for the rest of the decade.

items.title: Notice: Heat Pump Ready Programme
items.summary: The programme supports the development and demonstration of heat pump technologies and tools, and solutions for optimised deployment of heat pumps.

items.title: Promotional material: Employment Rights Act 2025: factsheets
items.summary: Further details on the measures included within the Employment Rights Act 2025.

items.title: Decision: East Anglia Two offshore wind farm: 2026 post-consent condition compliance, Planning Act 2008
items.summary: Decision by the Secretary of State on an application for post-consent condition compliance.

items.summary: Summary of the third meeting of the United Kingdom-Vietnam Free Trade Agreement (UKVFTA) Committee on Trade and Sustainable Development.

items.title: Guidance: Impact assessment and options assessment calculator
items.summary: Help for policy officials to calculate figures for impact assessments (IAs) and options assessments (OAs).

items.title: Minister McDonald speech at ADS annual dinner 2026
items.summary: Industry Minister Chris McDonald's speech at the ADS Annual Dinner, 27 January 2026.

items.title: Offshore Energy Strategic Environmental Assessment (SEA): An overview of the SEA process
items.summary: An explanation of the offshore SEA  process, including documentation of the most recent assessment and related consultation.

items.summary: SEA scoping consultation on the draft plan/programme to enable future offshore energy leasing and licensing

items.summary: How to submit open licence returns on the SPIRE export licensing system.

items.title: Domestic energy price indices
items.summary: Quarterly and monthly consumer price indices of fuel components in current and real terms.

items.title: Monthly and annual prices of road fuels and petroleum products
items.summary: Monthly and annual prices of road fuels and fuels used for home heating, plus an index of crude oil prices.

items.title: Comparisons of international road fuel prices
items.summary: Comparisons of road fuel prices against other EU countries, using data from the European Commission Oil Bulletin.

items.summary: Guidance updated to clarify which licences require returns and what information exporters must provide.

items.summary: How Export Control Joint Unit (ECJU) source, process and quality check data for the creation of the strategic export controls licensing statistics.

items.summary: The latest provisional monthly energy production, trade, electricity generation, consumption and prices statistics produced by the Department for Energy Security and Net Zero.

items.summary: Data on coal and coal-related products, including production, trade, consumption and stocks.

items.title: Accredited official statistics: Energy Trends: UK oil and oil products
items.summary: Data on oil and oil products, including upstream production and UK refinery activity, trade, stocks and demand.

items.title: Accredited official statistics: Energy Trends: UK gas
items.summary: Data on the UK's gas sector, including production, trade and demand.

items.title: Accredited official statistics: Energy Trends: UK electricity
items.summary: Data on electricity generation, supply, consumption and fuel use for generation.

items.summary: Quarterly and monthly data on weather patterns, including temperature, heating degree days, wind speeds, sun hours and rainfall.

items.summary: Data on overall energy balances of energy supply and demand in the United Kingdom.
